global_flags.description: additional domains to allow for CORS [array] [default: []]
fork the session when continuing (use with --continue or --session) [boolean]
enable mDNS service discovery (defaults hostname to 0.0.0.0) [boolean] [default: false]
custom domain name for mDNS service (default: opencode.local) [string] [default: "opencode.local"]
model to use in the format of provider/model [string]

flags.description: additional domains to allow for CORS [array] [default: []]
enable mDNS service discovery (defaults hostname to 0.0.0.0) [boolean] [default: false]
custom domain name for mDNS service (default: opencode.local) [string] [default: "opencode.local"]
model to use in the format of provider/model [string]
directory path to generate the agent file [string]
comma-separated list of tools to enable (default: all). Available: "bash, read, write, edit, list, glob, grep, webfetch, task, todowrite, todoread" [string]

subcommands.name: attach
subcommands.description: attach to a running opencode server

subcommands.name: logout
subcommands.description: log out from a configured provider

flags.description: Tool params as JSON or a JS object literal [string]

subcommands.name: paths
subcommands.description: show global paths (data, config, cache, state)

subcommands.name: diff
subcommands.description: show diff for a snapshot hash

subcommands.name: patch
subcommands.description: show patch for a snapshot hash

subcommands.name: import
subcommands.description: import session data from JSON file or URL

subcommands.name: pr
subcommands.description: fetch and checkout a GitHub PR branch, then run opencode

subcommands.name: stats
subcommands.description: show token usage and cost statistics

subcommands.name: uninstall
subcommands.description: uninstall opencode and remove all related files

subcommands.name: upgrade
subcommands.description: upgrade opencode to the latest or a specific version

subcommands.name: web
subcommands.description: start opencode server and open web interface
